alert.note: Alert for Labette; Montgomery; Neosho (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 15 at 7:31PM CST by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Labette, southeastern Neosho and southeastern Montgomery Counties through 800 PM CST... At 730 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cherryvale, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Parsons, Coffeyville, Cherryvale, Oswego, Chetopa, Altamont, Edna, Dearing, Mound Valley, Liberty, Bartlett, Labette, Parsons Tri City Airport, Angola, Dennis, Big Hill Lake, Coffeyville Airport and Lake Parsons. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CST for southeastern Kansas.
